WhatsAppModule.statics.author: kindra.cl
WhatsAppModule.statics.description: A module to integrate WhatsApp messaging functionality.
WhatsAppModule.settings.apiToken.descrip: API key for authenticating with WhatsApp API
WhatsAppModule.settings.localToken.descr: Local token for verifying incoming webhook requests
WhatsAppModule.settings.handleMedia.desc: Whether to handle media messages or ignore them
WhatsAppModule.settings.allowPersistentC: Whether to allow persistent changes to other modules to be triggered by WhatsApp messages
